name: SDND - Simple DragNDrop
body:
# SDND - Simple DragNDrop
SDND is a very lightweight JavaScript & jQuery based plugin that allows you to make any HTML element draggable (and droppable functionality will be added soon) with a simple line of code: 

> new SDND('.jQuerySelector').init();

You can add callback functions and lot more. Head over to the project page on GitHub for more details and try it out yourself. It is free to use and released under MIT license. Enjoy :)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
